blog.description: A bad idea written down is far better and far more useful to you than a blank sheet of paper and a mythical piece of brilliance that has been stuck in your head out of fear of failure. Go ahead and fail. Then make it better.

title: Sansa “Courtesy” Stark
body:
It surprises me that both fans (and antis) expect Sansa to be rude and ‘Sassy Sansa’ to Daenerys when they meet.

Have you met Sansa?

She is the most genuinely polite and politically polite person of all time. Her mantra is literally, “courtesy is a lady’s armor.”

Seriously the word courtesy appears 23 times in Sansa’s POV alone and 4 of those times Sansa is just reminding herself that courtesy is a lady’s armor. 

In Tyrion, Arya and Jon’s chapters the word is directly used in relation to Sansa 6 times. 20% of the word’s usage in the entire series is associated with Sansa Stark.

Sansa will be courtesy to a fault. Ever the Lady of Winterfell.

Now that doesn’t mean Sansa will be happy with the situation or even like Dany, but boy will she be polite.

Sansa will likely be cool and distant, with the strong possibility of her being polite to a scary degree (maybe even to Jon as well). Never saying anything rude, but never saying anything that is open and straightforwardly honest and just Sansa.  

If there is time (and there might not), I would be interested in seeing Dany’s reaction to that. Dany (book and show) does like it when people give her the proper respect but likes it even more when people are friendly and open to her, with that respect still given.

She also (my take) doesn’t seem to like playing the long game of politics (which many characters don’t). So, someone who is always courteous and polite, who never says anything that can be construed as rude, while at the same time never being warm and friendly or close to sisterly– I think would frustrate Dany.

The thing that gets me, is that people think Sansa will be ruder than Bran and Arya,

are you kidding me

Bran is the robot tree boy who has no filter and Arya is not exactly polite and respectful, especially not for courtly show.

But sure, Sansa ‘courtesy is my armor’ Stark will be the rude one.

tags: I'm bored which means gendrya edits lmao

summary: Arya : He was from Braavos. Anyway long hair, white on one side and red on the other. And the cutest smile. He said he'd teach...
body:
Arya : He was from Braavos. Anyway long hair, white on one side and red on the other. And the cutest smile. He said he'd teach me secrets. And he guessed my name... They're so romantic, the Lorathis.
Sansa : I thought you said he was from Braavos ?
Arya : Haven't you been listening ?
Sansa : ...Since eight o'clock last night...! You're in love.
Arya : Stupid ! There's no such thing as love at first sight.

dialogue.name: Arya
dialogue.label: Arya :
dialogue.phrase: He was from Braavos. Anyway long hair, white on one side and red on the other. And the cutest smile. He said he'd teach me secrets. And he guessed my name... They're so romantic, the Lorathis.
